sentences.sContent: They are charring wood in a kiln.
sentences.sContent_eng: They are charring wood in a kiln.
sentences.sCn: 他们正在窑内将木头烧成木炭。

sentences.sContent: That morning we fired our first kiln of charcoal.
sentences.sContent_eng: That morning we fired our first kiln of charcoal.
sentences.sCn: 那天上午，我们烧了我们的第一窑木炭。

sentences.sContent: CRAFT SUPPLIES: Whether it’s small items like yarn or big items like a kiln, craft hobbies don’t have to be hard on your wallet.
sentences.sContent_eng: CRAFT SUPPLIES: Whether it’s small items like yarn or big items like a kiln, craft hobbies don’t have to be hard on your wallet.
sentences.sCn: 手工艺品： 无论是小到像纱这样的东西，还是大到像窑这样的东西，对于手工艺的兴趣不会让你为荷包发愁。

synos.tran: （砖，石灰等的）[炉窑]窑；炉；干燥炉

remMethod.val: 煤窑(kiln)倒塌杀死(kill)了许多人

trans.tranOther: a special oven for baking clay pots, bricks etc
